original_title: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell(Proudly Made In India) (2-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 1.5kg Pair (2 x 1.5kg) Pink Hex Cast Iron Hand Weights Dumbbells Set with Non-Slip Grip for Home Gym Weights for Women and Men, cast iron with neoprene coating

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (2-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength training, resistance workouts, and fitness exercises at home, in classes, or in a gym setting.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and class participants looking for light fixed-weight dumbbells.
image_analysis.ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-coated finish rests on a light surface. Each end cap clearly shows the KAKSS logo and 1.5 KG marking in white, indicating fixed weight. The matte coating suggests a secure, non-slip hand grip.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Solid cast iron core keeps weight accurate and balanced for every rep
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap sand- or cement-filled dumbbells feel uneven and lose shape over time

comparison_points.our_benefit: Neoprene coating gives a soft, non-slip grip even when your hands get sweaty
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Bare metal or hard plastic handles slip easily and feel harsh on the hands

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hexagonal design stops the dumbbells rolling and keeps your home gym safer
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round dumbbells roll away, causing tripping hazards and interrupting workouts

comparison_points.our_benefit: Clear 1.5 KG print and pink colour make the right weight easy to grab quickly
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost weights fade or lack markings, so users constantly guess the weight
